headline: Doodle Vroom
description: A playful, high‑contrast sketch that turns motion into symbol: red/blue/black forms resolve into a vehicle‑totem, wheels and engine layered with notes like 'here to learn' and 'self‑reflection only.' The piece captures restless momentum and apprentice energy—movement for its own sake as a way of thinking.
resonantThread: Sketchbook play—vehicles of motion, travel energy, and learning by movement

motifMap.meaning: restless motion; momentum without fixed destination
power source as inner drive; desire to move and learn
fire vs. cool navigation; tension harnessed into flow

motifMap.symbol: handwritten notes ('here to learn', 'self reflection only')

associatedMedia.description: Photo of the sketch 'Doodle Vroom'—red/blue/black abstract vehicle-like forms on lined paper with handwritten notes.
